column2:
"Try using premium items!

*ARKS Cash (AC) is required to purchase premium items.
For more information, select the Buy AC button to display
the page about making in-game purchases.

*Premium items will help make \"Phantasy Star Online 2\"
even more fun."

"Try items exclusive to the SG Shop!

Note: You'll need SG to purchase items exclusive to the SG Shop.
Please select the [Purchase Star Gems] button and proceed to the purchase screen.

Items exclusive to the SG Shop make playing Phantasy Star Online 2 more fun."
"【クローズドβテスト】専用アイテムが追加されました！"
"【プレオープンβテスト・オープンβテスト】期間中のご注意"
"【正式サービス】開始！有料アイテムの販売がはじまりました！"
